description:
Livestreaming online has become the new 'TV', and Blab is an ideal starting place for you if you want to join in this digital revolution. Blab is a livestreamed conversational platform. People are using the app to chat with friends and family, discuss technology, learn to cook, follow fitness programmes and even join serious discussions about the state of the world, science and medicine.

You have the opportunity on Blab to just watch and listen, or to jump into the show and be a real live participant.

This course will guide you every step of the way, so that you will -

  • be confident as an audience member to ask and answer questions
  • be happy to jump in as a spontaneous guest
  • feel comfortable as an invited guest or even co-host
  • and even set up and host your own show!
title: 'Blab Mastery' - become a competent Blab Host
